DOC.criteria: Candidates registry must meet ALL follow criterion : Patients drug refractory recurrent symptomatic PAF three ( 3 ) AF episodes six ( 6 ) month prior enrollment one AF episode document within one ( 1 ) year prior enrollment . Documentation may include electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , transtelephonic monitor ( TTM ) , Holter monitor ( HM ) , telemetry strip . Failure least one AAD AF ( class I III AV nodal block agent beta blocker calcium channel blocker ) evidence recurrent symptomatic PAF , intolerable side effect . Age 18 year old . Able willing comply pre , post followup testing requirement . Signed Patient Informed Consent Form . Candidates exclude registry follow condition apply : Atrial fibrillation secondary electrolyte imbalance , thyroid disease , reversible noncardiac cause . AF episode last long 30 day terminate via cardioversion . CABG procedure within last six ( 6 ) month . Awaiting cardiac transplantation cardiac surgery . Documented leave atrial thrombus imaging ( i.e. , TEE , ICE , CT , MRA ) . History document thromboembolic event within past one ( 1 ) year . Diagnosed atrial myxoma . Significant congenital anomaly medical problem opinion investigator would preclude enrollment registry . Women pregnant ( history menstrual period pregnancy test history consider unreliable ) . Acute illness active systemic infection sepsis . Unstable angina . Uncontrolled heart failure . Myocardial infarction within previous two ( 2 ) month . History blood clot bleed abnormality . Contraindication anticoagulation ( i.e . heparin warfarin ) . Life expectancy le 12 month . Enrollment investigational study evaluate another device drug .
